maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastfundamentalswrapper.h

#ifndef BEAST_FUNDAMENTALS_WRAPPER_H
#define BEAST_FUNDAMENTALS_WRAPPER_H

#include <beastapi/beastutils.h>
#include <beastapi/beaststring.h>

#include <memory>
#include <string>
#include <maya/MDagPath.h>

namespace beastmaya {

template<class T>
class BeastObject {
public:
        BeastObject(T h) : m_obj(h) {
        }
        virtual ~BeastObject() = 0 {} // Please override in case you want to release the handle
        T obj() {
                return m_obj;
        }
private:
        void operator=(const BeastObject<T>& t) {
                // Disallow assignment
        }
        BeastObject<T>(const BeastObject<T>& t) {
                // Disallow copy construction
        }
protected:
        T m_obj;
};

class BeastString : public BeastObject<ILBStringHandle> {
public:
        BeastString(ILBStringHandle h) : BeastObject<ILBStringHandle>(h) {
        }

        ~BeastString() {
                ILBReleaseString(obj());
        }

        std::wstring asWString() {
                int len;
                ILBGetLength(obj(), &len);
                std::wstring res;
                res.resize(len-1);
                ILBCopy(obj(), &res[0], len);
                return res;
        }
};

class BeastException : public std::exception {
public:
        BeastException(ILBStatus s) : m_s(s) {
        }

        std::wstring getTypeString() {
                ILBStringHandle sh;
                ILBErrorToString(m_s, &sh);
                BeastString bs(sh);
                return bs.asWString();
        }

        std::wstring getExtendErrorInformation() {
                ILBStringHandle sh;
                ILBGetExtendErrorInformation(&sh);
                BeastString bs(sh);
                return bs.asWString();
        }

        ILBStatus getStatus() {
                return m_s;
        }

private:
        ILBStatus m_s;
}

inline makeException(ILBStatus s) {
        throw BeastException(s);
}

inline void BEAST_CALL(ILBStatus s) {
        // It's ok to not be successful if you're not implemented 
        if(s != ILB_ST_SUCCESS && s != ILB_ST_FUNCTION_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) {
                makeException(s);
        }
}

class BeastCamera;
class BeastInstance;
class BeastJob;
class BeastLight;
class BeastManager;
class BeastMaterial;
class BeastMesh;
class BeastRenderPass;
class BeastScene;
class BeastTarget;
class BeastTargetEntity;
class BeastTexture;
class BeastFramebuffer;
class BeastShader;
class BeastUVLayer;
class BeastLightPass;
class BeastLightPassEntry;
class BeastRNMPass;
class BeastAmbientOcclusionPass;
class BeastLuaPass;

typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastCamera> BeastCameraPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastInstance> BeastInstancePtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastJob> BeastJobPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastLight> BeastLightPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastManager> BeastManagerPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastMaterial> BeastMaterialPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastMesh> BeastMeshPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastRenderPass> BeastRenderPassPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastScene> BeastScenePtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastTarget> BeastTargetPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastTargetEntity> BeastTargetEntityPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastTexture> BeastTexturePtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastFramebuffer> BeastFramebufferPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastShader> BeastShaderPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastUVLayer> BeastUVLayerPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastLightPass> BeastLightPassPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastLightPassEntry> BeastLightPassEntryPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastRNMPass> BeastRNMPassPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastAmbientOcclusionPass> BeastAmbientOcclusionPassPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastLuaPass> BeastLuaPassPtr;

typedef std::weak_ptr<BeastInstance> BeastInstanceWPtr;
}

#endif // BEAST_FUNDAMENTALS_WRAPPER_H
